summary:
control your inner beast!

*unlimited time for your beast-form
*unlimited beast-form transformations per day
*turn and turn back by beast-form talent (need: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9891]Werewolf Loot[/url] mod by opensource634)
descriptionHtml:
[b]WereControl[/b] - now ToL compatible (Look at \"files section\" for ToL version)

[b]Overview:[/b]
*unlimited time for your beast-form
*unlimited beast-form transformations per day
*turn and turn back by beast-form talent (need: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9891]Werewolf Loot[/url] mod by opensource634)

[b]Requires:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9891]Werewolf Loot[/url] mod by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=923815]opensource634[/url]

[b]Installation:[/b]
0)Copy \"wereControl.esp\" and scripts directory into your Skyrim/Data/ directory 
1)Activate addon in the skyrim data-files menu (must be loaded after WW-Loot)

[b]How to transform back:[/b]
open character menu 
--> magic 
---> powers 
----> choose \"beast form\"
cast \"beast form\"

[b]Technical Notes:[/b]
unlimited time:
--- modified PlayerWerewolfQuest - modified PlayerWerewolfQuestScript property: Untimed = true
unlimited beast-form:
--- modified WerewolfChange Spell: type = Lesser Power
turn and turn back:
--- modified WerewolfChangeEffectScript - added WerewolfBeastRace check before transformation
--- modified WerewolfChangeEffect magic effect - added WerewolfChangeEffectScript property: WerewolfBeastRace

[b]Special Thanks:[/b]
Thanks [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=923815]opensource634[/url] for his extremely useful Werewolf Loot mod, it\'s really nice to be ww now)
author: Noxilie
